info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 21 at 6:28PM MDT until June 25 at 11:05AM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Washington...Idaho... Pend Oreille River below Albeni Falls affecting Pend Oreille and Bonner Counties. For the Pend Oreille River...including Hope, Albeni Falls, Albeni Falls...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pend Oreille River below Albeni Falls. * WHEN...Until late Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 100,000 cfs, Beehive Lane and Bear Paw Dr will be flooded at low spots. Water will be up to several homes on Yergens Rd, Riverbend Loop Road, and on Highway 20 near Deeter Road. Water will be up to the south end of Riverbend Loop Road. Many yards, outbuildings, and recreational sites along the river between Newport and Ione will be flooded. This flow corresponds approximately to 2042.5 feet (river rising 5/16/1997) to 2045 feet (river receding 6/24/1997) at the Cusick gage, based on 1997 records. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday the flow was 100,600 cfs. - Recent Activity...The maximum river flow in the 24 hours ending at 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday was 101,900 cfs. - Forecast...The river will remain nearly steady at around 101,000 cfs until Thursday then decrease and just above the action stage of 95,000 cfs before falling just below the action stage sometime late Friday night into Saturday morning. - Flood flow is 95,000 cfs. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 100,700 cfs on 06/03/1971. - http://www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/hydrograph.php?wfo=otx&gag e=alfw1 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 800 AM PDT.
